basics.name: Ryu Young
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Electrical Engineering in the Department of Engineering at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2025.

work.position: Tech-DNS Computer & Network Support Specialist Student Assistant
highlights: Troubleshoot software, hardware and networking issues within the library
Answer phone and email responses to the DNS Help Desk
Worked all parts of the store, from cashier, making musubis, cleaning back
Learned good communication habits and being professional

projects.organization: Center for Renewable Energy and Island Sustainability
projects.summary: Lead developer for weather sensing project
highlights: Design firmware for distributed weather sensor network
Maintain custom data collection and storage infrastructure
Webmaster/IT Officer, IEEE Student Branch, UH Manoa, 2012-2013

awards.title: AEVS 2023
awards.summary: Created an autonomous electric vehicle which would deliver parcels around the campus.

awards.title: AEVS 2024
awards.summary: 2nd iteration of the AEV. This improved model would have an upgraded sensor system and better motors. I am now the electical system team lead.
